body.name: Granitestone 10 Inch Stainless Steel Non Stick Frying Pan, Blue, Induction/Oven/Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 6 hrs 23 mins
features: Stainless Steel Pan: Cook like a professional at home with the Granitestone Stainless Steel Frying Pan – This frying pan is constructed from triple reinforced stainless steel, engineered to be your everyday warrior for all your cooking needs from cooking eggs, to stir frying foods, to searing and braising meats, and more, for years to come, without sticking.

Long Lasting Nonstick: Think healthier meals, easy food release, and effortless cleanups for years to come with Granitestone Stainless Steel- This frying pan is generously coated 3 times with nonstick coating, and reinforced with minerals to ensure foods and sticky sauces won’t stick to your frying pan while cooking for years on end, without oils or butters needed.

Tri-Ply Design: Perfectly cook, sear, and brown your foods! The Tri-Ply design consists of a thick aluminum core clad in between 2 layers of stainless steel, ensuring quick and even heating throughout the pan from end to end.

Easy Cleanup: Think quick and easy cleanups and forget about all the laborious scrubbing with the Granitestone stainless steel pan. Designed for an effortless wipe down after using, and a completely dishwasher safe finish, cleanup is effortless while allowing you to simply throw your pan in the dishwasher for a hassle-free cleanup experience.

Durable & Lasting: Constructed from sturdy stainless steel and reinforced with diamonds, this frying pan is durable enough to withstand any metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters, ensuring your frying pan stays good as new for years to come.

Oven & Stovetop Safe: This Frying Pan is oven safe up to 500 degrees and compatible with all types of stovetops- Gas, electric, halogen, ceramic, and induction – allowing you to cook virtually anywhere you’d like.

Stay Cool Handles: Designed for safe and easy handling, this frying pan features an ergonomic stainless-steel handle, easy to use for both righties and lefties, and remains cool to the touch while on or off the stove, keeping your hands safe while cooking.
Quick & Even Cooking: Constructed from stainless steel, uniform heating allows for a quick and even heat distribution from end to end, cooking foods perfectly and evenly throughout.

100% Healthy & Toxin Free: Keep a healthy and ecofriendly cooking environment with Granitetsone- Each piece of cookware is 100% free of PFOA, PFOS & any other harmful chemicals, keeping your kitchen completely toxin free.
10 Year Guarantee: Granitestone cookware is built to provide years of outstanding usage and is backed by a 10-year limited guarantee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice skillet with a heavy base so it stays put
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this skillet. It does clean easily, it has a solid feel, it has a heavy base so it stays where you put it. It heats evenly too. Very good value. Well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have not cooked with it yet but tried it out with water. Started to boil really fast. Looks like great quality and it seems like there won’t be sticking. Great quality for the price. Want to buy the 12 inch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a substantial pan - not cheap at all. Food cooks nicely and evenly. Easy to clean. Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good frying pan overall
reviews.reviewText: Finally got around to replacing my frying pan/skillet-- the one i had previously was a basic stainless steel model... that got ruined in a kitchen accident-- turns out the stove itself had wiring problems and boiled a pot of water on low... but, unfortunately, that former skillet of mine was not worth keeping as the scrubbing efforts were just futile. (stove has been replaced by the way)I bought this skillet because I liked the non stick feature of it, which makes cooking a lot of things easier. It's a bit heavier than my old one, heavier than I'd anticipated but... it's definitely lighter than my cast iron skillet that I like to rotate out.I needed an everyday skillet-- and this is great for that. The value for the money I would say is pretty spot on, and it doesn't feel cheaply made. I tend to hand wash my skillets even though this is dishwasher safe, I would rather just hand wash and know that it keeps in tip top shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this frying pan
reviews.reviewText: At first I was skeptical of not using any oil to grease the pan, however after the first couple of uses my mind was put at ease. Cooks food well with absolutely no food sticking. Cleans up in a flash. Thinking of purchasing the smaller size for my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pan for omelettes!
reviews.reviewText: I love to make omelettes and this pan is perfect for them! The size, nonstick coating and heating make for a perfect omelette every time. Also great for fried or scrambled eggs. It retains heat so well I don't even need to use it above a medium low heat setting. I've also used it for sauteeing vegetables and for roasting in the oven. Works great, good investment for any home cook!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I watched the Roundup from project farm and I bought this because this was a good value. Had a minimal hotspot and did moderately well with the none stickm on the hardness scale it didn't scratch until about a number 5 pick was used. Previously this was $20, at $30 "discounted" to $22. I'm not sure if still fits that value. The texture I wouldn't call smooth on the pan (if that matters to you( and NEVER believe any pan that says no need for oil, that's falsehood marketing crap. Cooked an over easy egg with a spatula, flipped and all. Good pan and good value with even heat distribution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fro the price
reviews.reviewText: great pan for the price. needed an pan for an induction burner. this pan works great and is very easy to clean.
Funciona adecuadamente. El único pero es que si se mancha con facilidad.
Heats uniformly, quick cooking on medium low heat. No sticking, easy to clean. Well constucted, heavy, nice looking.
Good quality pan, glad I went ahead and bought this. Good value for the price. I like that its stainless steel and not aluminum. Easy to clean. Hope it lasts!

Me encantó la calidad del.sarten y su precio. Llevo un mes usando el producto y ha sido fantástico. La facilidad para limpiar es buenísima. Simula un sarten de calidad premium. La cocción de alimentos es agradable. Llego super rápido y bien empacado. 100% recomendado.
